website_summaries.verdict: Features lots of bells and whistles that make cooking on it a pleasure, plus the sturdy construction is built to last.
pros: Excellent craftsmanship and impressive feature set that includes half-rack cooking for double the cooking space, rust and rain-proof materiel shell, heavy-duty cast iron cart, and easy to use ash removal unit
cons: Assembly is somewhat time consuming - some consumers report it taking up to two hours

customer_reviews.title: Hands down get the classic II.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, never understood the power of charcoal. 15 years of Weber propane and what a difference. Very easy to assemble out of the box. A bit on the heavy side. So far, fire stone pizza, beer can chicken and smash burgers in just 2 days. Has hardly had time to cool down. Passing down my beloved trusty Weber. Very simple to use once you understand how the airflow works. Tons of youtube videos to get your going. I had never heard of Kamado Joe, but once I started looking at the Green one this one stood out. My only wish is the casters were larger for easier rolling. Build like a tank, for years of use. Now back to cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Smithone

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best grill I've ever had. I have had over 50 grills from a Weber gas grill to a Traeger pellet grill. This is by far the best. Food has unbelievable flavor. In my search for the best grill, I have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Terrible Customer service
customer_reviews.text: We love the grill so far. However the ceramic inserts came with chipped edges out of the package. For a product this expensive I expect any damaged parts to be replaced. I sent pictures of the damaged parts to Kamado Joe the same day we received the grill. We have been ignored for weeks now. Due to this I can't recommend this brand. I would tell prospective buyers to go with the green competitor instead. The performance of the green egg seems to be equal for about he same price. If they don't ignore their customers, they might have an edge. Thanks for nothing Kamado Joe customer service!
customer_reviews.author: RGARCH

customer_reviews.title: Yes sir!
customer_reviews.text: The best of the best. Awesome flavor for a heck of a price. Smoked salmon yesterday for 2.5 hours at 200 degrees. Pulled them off, got the air flowing and cooked two whole chickens on 350 for an hour. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without it.
customer_reviews.text: Good Lord, I love my Kamado Joe. I was going to purchase a Big Green Egg, as I thought that was the only brand of these. But I found a comparison video on You Tube between the Big Green Egg and the Kamado Joe. After watching, there is no way anyone would choose the Green over the Red. I was a bit intimidated at first, but soon found the interactivity of getting the temps perfect and multi level cooking really enjoyable. Get it and you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon H.

customer_reviews.title: First one arrived in broken pieces, second one did not have ash box
customer_reviews.text: This is a Joe Jr. it is only 15", it doesn't seem to come with an ashbox, even though it is listed in the manual that comes with it. It did not come in the first box, which contained a very broken grill,. the secon arrived in good shape except the metal grill did 'wear" on the inside of the ceramic top- don't know if this makes it weaker. No ash box in this one either. Are these seconds?
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer1000001

customer_reviews.title: Bad Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Top of Ceramic Grill cracked all the way through. I have Picture from as soon as I opened the box. Now there are none to replace with. Sad !
customer_reviews.author: Kenton Wilhite

customer_reviews.title: READ THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS!!! It will arrive broken
customer_reviews.text: Mine was severly damaged in shipping. Phone number on their website doesn't work. Good luck putting it back in the box after you open it. I should have bought a green egg locally. better quality. Oh made in China all over it. Live and learn I guess. Now I'm out 400 bucks UPDATE. after finally getting ahold of support I'm told the part I need to fix it is on backorder for 3-4 weeks. UPDATE. Got the replacement part in after a month. Updated to 3 stars for fast shipping after I called them. We'll see how it cooks this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: MANOWAR©

customer_reviews.title: The best grill that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases that comes to my mind. Food tastes incredible and is very efficient burn time. Four handfuls of lump charcoal and smoked a 5lb beef brisket for 8 hours and when done closed up the vents and charcoal put themselves out and 2 days later shake off the ash and had enough charcoal left to cook two more dinners on same charcoal, incredible. Keeping temperature is a learning curve that takes a few tries and when smoking you don't need to add a huge amount of wood chunks just a few smokes for a very long time. If you cook for 2 or 3 people this grill is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Good grill but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a Kamado Joe Jr. Arrived with cracks in both the lid and ceramic inserts. Sent it back and ordered a second one. Replacement arrived with a shattered lid. Do not cut the green packaging straps if at all possible. Those are immensely helpful if you need to return this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for both grilling and smoking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the KJ in December. I previously used a Weber Kettle for charcoal grilling, Weber Genesis for propane grilling and a Weber Smokey Mountain smoker. The KJ will grill hotter for searing steaks than the kettle and the KJ is very easy to console low and slow temperatures when smoking ribs, pork butt or brisket. I am very happy with the purchase. The KJ both cooks Burrer and is easier to clean up / prepare for the next cook than the kettle or WSM smoker. I had resisted purchasing a Kamado cooker due to cost but I am now very happy I took the plunge.
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: hands down the best affordable ceramic grill
customer_reviews.text: hands down the best affordable ceramic grill. KJ innovates and innovates and innovates. You will not be disappointed in the product or the company and their customer service! Huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing though.
customer_reviews.text: Came with some issues due to shipping but the company was quick to remedy after asking for & receiving pictures. My guy was able to wrangle this together by himself, but I wouldn't be able to do it alone. This thing is amazing though...if you're on the fence, just get it, you will not be disappointed. We've used an inexpensive Weber kettle for so long that I'm a little sick it took us years to finally jump for a Kamado Joe. Now I know why people love grilling out so much. We're still learning different techniques and how to master it, but we've been able to grill and smoke in all kinds of crappy weather--something we could never do before.
customer_reviews.author: mad hatter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold temperature well
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Kamado Joe in 2016. About a year and half since 2016 my dome cracked. Kamado Joe sent me a replacement dome. Since I have had the new dome my grill does not hold it’s temperature well when I check on the food through out the cook. the temp does not come back up to where it was. I am always tending to the vents. Even when I have I my vents wide open it does not get back up to my original temp that I want to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Clause

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite Amazon purchase EVER... And it KILLS the BGE...
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a fortune on this dang site... But this Kamado Joe II and the JJ George Table are truly the most satisfying order I have ever made. I never really like the BGE, color, racking system, etc. But the Kamado Joe II solves all of those problems, totally... BGE started in 1972 - Last years estimated revenues were $80M Kamado Joe started in 2009 - Last years estimated revenues were $60M That tells you something there alone...
customer_reviews.author: Daveh777

customer_reviews.title: Best grill/smoker ever.
customer_reviews.text: Wait till the holidays to buy as you get a killer deal on these. I've never used a kamado before but friends and family rave about them so I bought one. A small learning curve but that is with most grills. Nicely accessorized and many items available. holds temp like nobody's business. my buddy got an egg, now he wishes he'd went with the joe. If you can afford it, buy the largest one you can, as you will want to upgrade later.
customer_reviews.author: RTS

customer_reviews.title: Will update when have more info.
customer_reviews.text: Just want to go on record saying this was just delivered without the straps holding the box and pallet together. So the smoker was jarred during offloading. The delivery guy (who was nice could be) explained that the straps came off in the warehouse. After my husband unpacks it and checks it I’ll know whether there is any damage to the unit.
customer_reviews.author: SoMiKo

customer_reviews.title: Stop wasting your time
customer_reviews.text: I feel stupid for not owning this grill sooner. Stop wasting your time with whatever you're currently grilling with. Extremely versatile - I've smoked briskets for 10 hours without adding coal, seared steaks at 750 degrees and cooked pizza's with indirect heat. Comes with everything you need to become a BBQ Wizard
customer_reviews.author: Jason Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Consumer Reports best
customer_reviews.text: I buy what Consumer Reports recommends. They rated this #1. A friend has one and convinced me I'd get rid of my gas grille. Having used this product a half dozen times, I'm not convinced. Having to light charcoal and wait 20 minutes before you can close the lid and get to the temp you want is a pain and too much of a task. For long or low n slow cooking this would be good. But it takes too long to heat up and too long to cool down. A gas grille is simple and quick.
customer_reviews.author: David Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my hubby for our anniversary. He loves it. It is very heavy, I would recommend having it delivered as close to the place where you'll be using it as possible, or at least the closes flat spot...we had to get ours up a set of concrete stairs which was very challenging. It lights easily and holds a steady temperature. Because it holds heat overnight, we typically have to wait until the next morning to cover it after use. It is perfect for large hunks of meat. We still cook our veggies on the gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: Dkf

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. The innovations that Kamado Joe makes made my decision amongst other kamado grills for me. First cook I did was BBQ spatchcocked chicken and I couldn’t believe how moist and juicy it was with a nice amount of smoke that wasn’t overpowering. Best purchase I’ve made since my house!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D. Fehling

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Have had this about a month now and it works like a champ. Have used every weekend and made some good food. Next time I will get the Big Joe. Cooking area is a little cramped at times, but cooking only for 2 people it's not to much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Best grill i've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best grill i've ever owned!! bought it in December and been cooking on it 3 /5 time a week. It's worth ever bit of the price. I use comado joe large lump charcoal very good as well cooks hot and long lasting with less charcoal and hardly no ash..
customer_reviews.author: DocHoliday

customer_reviews.title: I love this Kamado Joe Jr
customer_reviews.text: I love this Kamado Joe Jr! It is perfect for a smaller gathering or as an every day BBQ. It performs well and can do all the same great things your larger Kamados will do. The packaging on this BBQ was very good. It arrived attached on it's own pallet with great protection in perfect condition. Thank you Weekend BBQ Store!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H

customer_reviews.title: Love my Joe
customer_reviews.text: I love my Kamado Joe. It shipped safely and was quite easy to put together (with an extra set of hands...it's heavy). This grill is great for smoking brisket and wings plus so much more. It takes a little practice getting the temperature up and down but once you get the hang of it, there is nothing better.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Smoker/Grill
customer_reviews.text: I have really been enjoying my Kamado Joe grill!! So far I've smoked a pork butt and ribs, and grilled some steaks and they were all delicious!! I recently ordered a pizza stone and am looking forward to making some pizzas next. Lots of other things I want to try as well as this thing does it all!! It came with most of the needed accessories and was very easy to put together. Great quality grill!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Berry

customer_reviews.title: Quality First!
customer_reviews.text: Unpacking this Grill is a pure delight... The precision and care invested in the packaging speaks loudly for the quality and precision of this grill. I am a high end custom cabinet manufacturer and a bit of a perfectionist. I can't speak to the ceramic material itself, but the fit & finish of this grill is great. As well as the stand, grates, and other accessories. I have accommodated many Green Eggs in outdoor kitchens and I bought this (KamadoJoe) and very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding grill
customer_reviews.text: I have been the owner of many grills including the green egg. I prefer the Kamado Joe over all the smokers and grills I have owned in the past and that includes a fifty five gallon barrel grill that I purchased and learned from the old pit masters in Texas how to really smoke a brisket. It's a little expensive but is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Go Joe!
customer_reviews.text: Love our Joe! We spent months reading pros and cons and reviews between the Joe and the Green Egg. No regrets going with the Joe. I think the feature that makes the biggest difference is the top suspension which doesn’t let it slam and frankly the hardware for the Joe is tougher and the you get all the basics in the initial purchase. You aren’t nickled and dimed for every part like the Green Egg. We use it every weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken?!?
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic egg was broken when my new Classic II arrived today! What a bummer. It looks like the packer forgot to put a styrofoam piece at the top of the smoker and someone must have stacked something heavy on top of it or dropped it....That is a real shame! No smoking for me this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: cdd

customer_reviews.title: It Cooks flawlessly and isn't high maintenance for cooking. It's actually pretty easy.
customer_reviews.text: Best steak I have ever cooked. After several years of propane gills I decided to go to a pellet grill. My neighbor has a BGE and told me I wouldn't be disappointed and would have more options with a Kamado than a Pellet Grill. Boy was he right. I complimented my purchase with the iKammand and it is awesome. You'll love this grill too.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Pattison

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery team!
customer_reviews.text: The two delivery guys from Pilot were exceptional! Friendly, helpful and respectful, very pleased! The grill is awesome. Have not had a chance to use it yet, but I love it so far! It is a heavy sucker. Don't try to put it on the stand alone! I paid the extra $20.00 to have it brought to my patio.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous defect - No response from company
customer_reviews.text: The grill tool that comes in the box was defective and had a sharp burr on handle. I emailed company and still no response after two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: John G Tarrant

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Kamado-style grill
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this grill, with the exception of the latch mechanism. This was loose when I received the grill, and promptly fell apart. I was able (with difficulty) to re-assemble it, and now it works fine. The instructions for doing so were non-existent, so even after Googling and YouTubing, I had to just fiddle around with it until I figured it out. Otherwise, the grill is sturdy and well-made, and I am pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Simons

customer_reviews.title: Our Kamado
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!! I have used and loved Weber as well as a Big Green Egg. They have taken all the greatest things the Green Egg has to offer, figured how to make it better and implemented it. I would buy this one thousand times over. After having a BGE I wanted more and KJ has everything you want and the ability to easily cook a rotisserie chicken, wings, steak or anything else one could possibly want. If you are considering a Kamado style cooker this is the one to buy-period!
customer_reviews.author: cck

customer_reviews.title: There are a lot of videos available that are very informative on how to use the grill.
customer_reviews.text: My first use of the grill was to smoke a 20lb turkey. I followed advice on using the grill from on-line sources. My guest all said it was the juiciest, most flavorful turkey they had every had. It took 3 hours to smoke. I can't wait to try smoking ribs. Best grill I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: JPH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill, Amazing Smoker
customer_reviews.text: The Kamodo Joe is an awesome grill. If that were all it was it would be worth it. But it excels as a smoker as well. Getting it up to the right temperature can take a while (and a few times using it to fully get the hang of it) but it is easy to maintain a consistent temp once you do. The thing is a beast, and indestructible. Fantastic purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Evans

customer_reviews.title: Kamado Joe Classic is AWESOME, I'm throwing the gas grill away
customer_reviews.text: I've had this grill for about 6 months now and have not found a single negative thing about it. Easy to maintain temps, food always taste great, clean up is a breeze. I've smoked something almost every week I've owned this grill. I cannot imagine life without it. You cannot go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible every part was damaged on arrival only reason I even gave it a 1 star was because it was easy to return
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. It is very heavy. Be prepared when you need to lift it into the stand.
customer_reviews.author: busy mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  (Older model)
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that we have purchased as a gift. Delivered promptly and in great shape. Setup was easy (two people required) and we were cooking within an hour after it was delivered to the kids' house. This is the older model, but comes with the same guarantee from KJ. We purchased each time as a Deal of the Day, and thus received a nice discount to the normal price. Great product. As a Big Green Egg owner, I think this is equivalent. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to buy one of these after several friends gave them and similar products rave reviews. I finally took the plunge and I have been extremely happy with my purchase. I’ve done everything from low and slow ribs to 700 degree pizza and everything has turned out incredibly well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good - But Worth a Review
customer_reviews.text: The grill arrived early with excellent packaging. It was left in my driveway where I opened the box and brought all the small parts to my patio. This is quite a bit of weight with the cooking chamber components being quite heavy. I then was able to move the Egg to my patio by myself .It assembled easily and the quality is amazing. I can't wait to start cooking and I am so happy son far that I added a review.
customer_reviews.author: Wave

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: We have used this twice so far and has been great. Wish there were color options, however love the features of this compared to BGE. Setup was simple and was pretty easy to move around after unpacking. Looking forward to using this more and more this spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loving it !!!'
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a gift. He was going on and on about buying a Green Egg but I did a lot of research and found the Kamado Joe to be very equal to the Egg and the cost was better. He loves his gift and has used it many times already. He's absolutely thrilled with the Joe. Arrived in days in a large box on a skid.
customer_reviews.author: Slill

customer_reviews.title: Best steaks ..... EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ponied up the big bucks for this. Almost impossible to screw up a steak. Just watch any You Tube video on how to with this thing and you're cooking like a pro. One of my better choices so for in this life. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: love the design and setup was less 40 mins
customer_reviews.text: love the design and setup was less 40 mins. Had the fire going in 25 mins and food cooked perfectly. Set the temp with the upper and lower air vents and it stayed right on. Excellent design.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Red

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS GRILL/SMOKER. We will never eat another steak on our regular grill again. If you like smoked meats, this is the way to go. Rather pricey but it's an investment and will last forever. Don't regret it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Y

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid, versatile BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Once you cook a few things on this grill you’re hooked and there’s no going back to gas! The versatility is insane, you can cook everything from 225F low-and-slow ribs or prime rib to 900F quickfire pizzas. Wish I had bought it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: one and done! Last grill you will ever need.
customer_reviews.text: A whole new way of grilling! I got this in the dead of winter and have just started cooking on it. Smoked on it, seared on it, BBQ burgers, perfect! Looking forward to cooking on this for the rest of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Handy601

customer_reviews.title: and the grilled food tastes great with no
customer_reviews.text: makes grilling with charcoal very convenient, and the grilled food tastes great with no, or very little, seasoning
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to barbeque. We bought the Kamado Joe because he thought it would work well. He was right (as usual), He has grilled steaks and smoked ribs and both have come out delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Pizza pizza
customer_reviews.text: Have used Big Green Egg for years and it’s a great grill. This is more refined than the Big Green Egg plus I like the color. The hinge, gasket, and ash catcher are all very nice features that the Egg currently lacks. Well made great grill. Also great at a pizza oven for coal fire pizza
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Best ceramic grill out on the market. Totally worth getting this Joe with more options than the green egg. Cooks with perfection. Have baked pizzas, smoked pork, and cooked steaks. No issues. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great ceramic cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have used a big green egg for many years liked some features of this one, so when we moved I got one. Sure am happy I did! The mesh seal, locking top and ease of cleaning are big pluses. Haven’t had it too long but it seems to hold its temperature better.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Kamado Grill
customer_reviews.text: Quality is the word. My second Kamado grill. Can run a very low temperatures for those long cooks. Use this grill with Fogo Charcoal and well, just great cooks.
customer_reviews.author: William Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Holds temp perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. First time I've BBQ with charcoal. Did an 8 lbs Boston Butt and it turned out amazing. temperature held at 275 for over 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: i guess from shipping but it was fine. I really like Kamado Joe products I think ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned the box had a couple of holes in it, i guess from shipping but it was fine. I really like Kamado Joe products I think they are a great value compared to the others out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Older Design
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it was the original design Kamado Joe without the latch and improved hinge but it's still a great product and I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Carrier failure.
customer_reviews.text: Grill is fine. Delivery was scheduled at time of order, for 11 June. Actual delivery was 17 June; no phone call or explanation. Very disappointed in the carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W Hooker Jr

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill I Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Amazing grill. I just love this thing. I had an issue with the top vent sticking but reached out to their customer support and they shipped a new one out to me. Food is delicious on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: kreyn

customer_reviews.title: WOW this thing really works well.  I was skeptical until I got one.  Total believer!!
customer_reviews.text: It is worth the money! I thought this was really expensive but firends told me it was worth it. We after using it for a while I am a true believer. Food just tasts better and it is SO MUCH easier to grill with then a gas grill (I replaced my Weber gas unit).
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Free delivery and installation was awesome. The grill is well worth it and very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christie P.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill. I stilling learning how to cook on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. I stilling learning how to cook on it. Had some issues with the delivery but the delivery driver waited for 40 minutes for me to get home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipping time was long.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping to my home was a long process. When it came around 8:30 PM, I just happen to go to the front door and there it was on the sidewalk. Glad I was home. I got the credit card bill long before I actually received the grill. It's a great grill. Glad I purchased it. Cooked two racks of ribs today.
customer_reviews.author: Garland H

customer_reviews.title: Well built cooking monster!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a better steak than a traeger can even dream of. Better everything! Everything I've cooked and baked on it is the best I've had. Reverse seared steaks are unreal tasty! Pizza is awesome on this thing. Turkey, Boston butts, ribs, and letson manok was the best I've ever had with the joetisseri. Buy one, you wont be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value and great features.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this grill. I already own a Big Green Egg mini-max and wanted a larger one so I decided to comparison shop. I found the Kamado Joe to have more features, better reviews and a slightly lower price. They pack a lot of innovation and standard features into this very durable unit. Other brands charge extra for accessories that come standard with the Kamado Joe classic.
customer_reviews.author: K.W. Kidwell

customer_reviews.title: No Ceramics Warranty Support
customer_reviews.text: Buy at your own risk! Bought new on Amazon and loved the grill for about a year. Ceramics have begun to crumble and crack. I have been emailing customer support for two months with absolutely no response. Highly disappointed. They tout their lifetime warranty on ceramics, but don't back it up! Should have bought an Egg I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D.

customer_reviews.title: Better buy than a BGE
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Good comes out amazing and the features that the Joe has compared to the Big Green Egg really set it apart. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Windy City

customer_reviews.title: Joe rules!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I've been waiting for. It has truly meet all my expectations. For my family of 4, it's just the right size. If I cooked for more than that on a regular basis, I would upsize to the BigJoe. Very, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: SLG

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me several tries to perfect 'starting the fire', but now I feel like a grill-zled veteran of my grill...this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: blamar

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Last grill I’ll ever have to buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, stainless grills are heavy gauge and easy to clean. Delivery was perfect and right on schedule
customer_reviews.author: Jlewk

customer_reviews.title: 3000 year old cooking at it's best
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible, versatile cooking machine. Bring your loved ones closer and enjoy some of the best controlled outdoor cooking year round. Low and slow or pizzas in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Best grill ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best grill out there. Been using it nonstop. They come with a lot of great accessories. Easy to setup.l, but heavy. Will need two people.
customer_reviews.author: Wood

customer_reviews.title: Best F***ing grill/smoker I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Smoking meat is super easy, and when you get your coals fired up you can bring it over 900 degrees within minutes. Who doesn’t want perfect ribeyes in 2 minutes? Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It’s heavy but it’s simple to setup and use.
customer_reviews.text: Shout out to the delivery driver first. He put it out by the pool where I wanted it. It’s heavy no doubt. Set up was easy with one other person. I watched a few vids to get the feel for lighting and controlling the heat. Awesome grill.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer poppat

customer_reviews.title: Kamado Grill
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved my Kamado Grill 18” Joe! It’s fantastic! It add fun to our summer Family BBQ!!! Great Grill!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Twain

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I have been owning this grill for a few months now. I can only say it is amazing product. All my friends agree with me after they tasted BBQ meet, pork and poultry. Everything is coming out very juicy with nice smoky smell. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best grill ever
customer_reviews.text: Best grill I’ve ever used. I’ll never go back to any other kind.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful grill that I bought for my husband's birthday. He loves it and mentioned that the grill hood locking feature was the differentiator why he didn't want other similar grills. We love the red color and enjoy cooking on it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Superior to any gas grill I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Superior to any gas grill I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES J HUDDLESTON

customer_reviews.title: ... one of these you have been missing out just like I was
customer_reviews.text: If you have never cooked on one of these you have been missing out just like I was. Nice. Priced a little high. But where I live there aren't anyone selling them.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchencop

customer_reviews.title: Just do it. No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. Changed my game in the kitchen big time. Will never use a regular grill again
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Mead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. The delivery was seamless and done well.
customer_reviews.author: RDT

customer_reviews.title: Kamado Magic
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to step up my game when it comes to BBQ and smoking meats. This grill meets every requirement. Very well built and includes essentials that the BGE charges extra for like the rolling stand, heat deflector and the split grill (divide and conquer). If you are in the market for a Kamado grill, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love our Kamado! I waited a couple of weeks until we had a chance to learn the grill before posting a review. We use it every day for everything from meat to veggies to pizza. Delivery was very fast. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything is easy with the kamado joe! It's easy to find good cooking tips online and as long as you control your temp, it's pretty much guaranteed that your food will be excellent
customer_reviews.author: rob99

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product and the versatility.
customer_reviews.text: An absolute must have item if you're into cooking and grilling.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill/Smoker!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Kamado Joe after using my sons. It's easy to use, burns the lump charcoal very efficiently, and holds it temp for hours. One load of charcoal more than lasted me for a 6 hour smoking session. Keeps the meat moist and the flavor is unbelievable. Expensive, yes....but if you enjoy smoking or grilling it is well worth it. The Kamado Joe comes with accessory's other manufactures charge extra for...
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy- will need assistance with assembly and moving. but, outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is top notch- excellent build quality, easy assembly, versatile cooking platform, outstanding temperature control.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Delivers
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for barbeque, but not for someone who wants a quick steak.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Alice Kruesi

customer_reviews.title: Best grill I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This grill can do it all. It is very heavy thought. When you get it delivered, you will need help moving it. Once it's in place, it is the best thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product hands down beats the egg and backyard bbq's customer service is top notch, they will go above and beyond to make sure you are happy with your grill!
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Best!!
customer_reviews.text: Best grill I have ever owned. I've have grilled chicken and steaks, all turned out great. I have smoked ribs and pork butts and the flavor is out of this world!
customer_reviews.author: V. Yue

customer_reviews.title: Elevate your outdoor cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great charcoal grill. very easy to maintain the same temp throughout long cooking times. Can't be beat. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: monica DeSantis

customer_reviews.title: Came defective
customer_reviews.text: The item came with a bent handle. There is no way to contact Amazon or Kamado JOe to replace . Ridiculous....
customer_reviews.author: H. George

customer_reviews.title: This is a great grill and does everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill and does everything I expected. It is easy to start and to maintain a desired temperature. Except for the initial cost, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought years ago. Expensive but worth it. Definitely get the delivery. VERY HEAVY!!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery and installation
customer_reviews.text: Grill arrived in perfect shape and on time. Very heavy so had installer put it together. Took him 20 minutes alone. Very nice grill. Temps are easy to control and perfect size for small family ( 4 or 5).
customer_reviews.author: Tonda Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Grill
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Came when promised in perfect condition. Even came with new style firebox. Had it unpacked, put together and fired up in less than 30 minutes. Super easy to dial in and maintain temp. Huge upgrade from my steel kamado.
customer_reviews.author: j.b

product_meta.title: Kamado Joe KJ23RHC Classic II Charcoal Grill, 18 inch, Blaze Red
product_meta.description: Style:Classic IIThe Kamado Joe Classic II includes new innovation, featuring a thick-walled, heat-resistant shell that locks in smoke and moisture at any temperature. Smoke at 225F with precise temperature contro using our Kontrol Tower Top Vent or ramp up the fire to 750F and sear with direct charcoal flavored heat on the 2-Tier Divide & Conquer grill system. The Kamado Joe Classic II Charcoal Grill is compatible with a robust range of Kamado Joe accessories and grilling surfaces providing you premium results for any type of grilling or smoking that it is called upon.
feature_bullets: Premium 18″ Ceramic Grill with Cast Iron Cart & Locking Wheels – The Kamado Joe Classic II gives the perfect cooking size of 18 inches along with its Premium cart that comes with the purchase of your grill, including locking casters and wheels.

2-Tier Divide & Conquer - Divide & Conquer Flexible Cooking System transforms the humble grill grate into the most powerful cooking tool in your arsenal. The revolutionary multi-level, half-moon design frees you to cook different foods in different styles at different temperatures—all at the same time

Kontrol Tower Top Vent - Maintains consistent air setting for precise airflow management during dome opening and closing. Constructed of powder coated cast aluminum, the patent pending dual-adjustment top vent is rain and mold-resistant and allows you to smoke from 225F all the way to searing at 750F.
Patented Air Lift Hinge – Reduce dome weight by 96% with the Patented Air Lift Hinge. The grill dome can be lifted with a single finger giving the most comfortable grilling experience there is.
AMP (Advanced Multi-Panel) FireBox – The patent pending six-piece design eliminates breakage and increases grill efficiency.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars450 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
